entry.title: Environment Setup
entry.content: Windows (Git Bash)Download and Install Node.jsNode.js Install hexo1npm install hexo-cli -g Clone GitHub repo and checkuot source branch123git clone git@github.com:Baternest/baternest.github.io.git -b source --recursivecd baternest.github.io.gitnpm install hexo --save Set author info12git config user.name "Luo ZhengHong"git config user.email "baternest@gmail.com" Create a new post1hexo new "My New Post" Generate and Deploy the blog12hexo generatehexo deploy
